job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pA Fintech company in the financial services industry is looking for 3 Machine Learning NLP Engineers to join their Machine Learning AI  Predictive Analytics team In this role you will be responsible for leading improvements in core machine learning and AIdriven products At any given time you will be working alongside a team of about 25 other engineers and tasked with up to two projects Most of the work involves developing datadriven and algorithmdriven models and software products  specifically working with various news feeds This position will be a contract to permanent onboarding model with benefits offered during the contract phase ppbrppstrongDesired Skills and ExperiencenbspstrongppMust have 3 plus years of work experience after obtaining a Masters Degree or PhD in Computer Science Statistics Mathematics Economics or other quantitative fields with a focus on Machine Learning AI NLP Deep Learning and or data driven statistical analysis and modelingppPrevious experience working as an NLP Engineer Natural Language ProcessingppIn depth knowledge of Artificial Intelligence AI and Machine Learning libraries TensorFlow PyTorch Keras NumpyppStrong programing skills 5 years in PythonppExperience developing endtoend machine learning prototypesppbrppstrongPlussesstrongppSecondary programming languages Java CC R or ScalappBig data frameworks Hadoopp
